showerReviews.reviewText: … seen people slip. We have elderly men that use the pool. God forbid something happens to them. Stall #3 shower head is busted. Water comes out of the threads and mother shower head. So much soap scum on the tile grout. Getting to. the …
… Official EoS Policy. NO NUDITY (exposure  of genitals) IN THE LOCKER ROOM OTHER THAN IN THE SHOWER. Religious Body Shaming In My Opinion. …

… staff was awesome. Being handicap they made me feel right at home and next time that I am in Murrieta volunteering my time or just visiting the family I will definitely stop in for a session and a much needed shower. Kudos to the staff …
Love the gym, equipment and amenities. Sales people are a little pushy. Seen some drain flies in the ladies shower rooms…. Just joined. Will update as I continue …

… 1) The amount of bugs in the showers was far greater than I'm comfortable with. An occasional fly is inevitable; FIFTY drain flies is a problem. And that's just how many I could count from the shower stall I was in; about ten of those were …
I went twice and both times the water in the shower was cold. The water in the hot tub wasn't near hot enough to do any good. It was the worst gym experience I've ever had!
Lots of flies in shower area,standing water in pool deck drains full of mold attracts pests …

Very close to my house and a lot of activities daily...
It's really nice and clean..great shower area..private...
Dirty locker rooms & broken shower heads & very young clientel, like under 18, kinda loud & disrespectful

locations.title: LA Fitness
locations.street: 125 N Twin Oaks Valley RdCloses soon 11 pm Fri "Friendly staff
locations.content: LA Fitness may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … ladies there weren't that nice. That might have changed (it was 18 months ago they were last there). With that said, the locker room is clean, and they have a shower in the pool area so more people rinse before getting in, which is nice.

… jaccuzzi routinely gets cloudy and green from bacteria so sometimes you don't want to go in, and repairs take a long time, like the large/handicapped shower head was broken for weeks before they fixed it, and it still is cracked and leaks. …
Nicely maintained gym. Equipment is a bit more up to date than some other LA Fitness locations. Shower was clogged, but otherwise we'll maintained.

showerReviews.reviewText: I stayed here in June 2025 on my last night of a bicycle ride from Santa Barbara to San Diego.  It is a nice facility and clean.  Bathrooms are rather limited for men (the second floor has a single common toilet but also a women's shower, …

Stayed here 12 years ago when the hostel was under different ownership, and it was lovely to be back—lovely staff, comfy beds, and clean premises. Awesome location. I am a very light sleeper so I slept with white noise in my earbuds and slept great. The walls are a bit thin. Highly recommend this place!

Great stay. Wonderful people. The private rooms don't have attached bathrooms but I got the gender neutral bathroom and shower just when I needed it, empty and available. No complaints. Met some really nice people at breakfast. It was a quick night cap for me but good luck to them!

showerReviews.reviewText: Great customer service. Very clean. Lobby, our room and the pool area were neat and inviting. They had a fire pit going it the front sitting area.
The room was VERY clean and amenities were well worth the rate.  Breakfast was very nice and the fire pit was peaceful.

showerReviews.reviewText: We had a great stay here! The room was spacious and clean, and the front desk staff was very sweet at check in. My only gripe would be that the mattress was a little firm for my boyfriend so he had a tough time sleeping. I didn't mind it …
